description:
A tasty dish of pasta with sausage crumbles and a creamy cheese sauce finished with a dash of cayenne pepper, something to hit the spot at the end of a long day.

  • Packaging clearly shows allergens and nutritional information, and has a graduated scale on one side, so you know how much water to add
  • Ingredients: pasta, spiral (ground durum wheat semolina, water, salt), pork sausage crumbles (pork, less than 2% salt, spices, sugar, sodium phosphate), nonfat dry milk (grade a pasteurized skim milk), potato starch, dehydrated sweet cream (sweet cream solids), cheddar cheese white [(milk, salt, cultures, & enzymes), and disodium phosphate. may contain sodium silico aluminate at 2%], parmesan cheese [(partially skim milk, culture, salt, enzymes) and disodium phosphate], bell pepper red & green combo, white onion, garlic granulated, chives, thyme, sea salt, oregano, red pepper crushed, natural lemon flavor (maltodextrin, dextrose, natural flavor, acacia gum, and tricalcium phosphate), cayenne pepper (ground red pepper)
  • Allergens: contains milk, sulphites and wheat
  • No cooking needed, simply add water, stir, wait and enjoy
  • Meals have a 5-year shelf life
name: AlpineAire Spicy Sausage Pasta
